Method Detail

getSlotContents

@IPSJexlMethod(description="Get the contents of a slot as a list of assembly items",
               params={@IPSJexlParam(name="item",description="the parent assembly item"),@IPSJexlParam(name="slotName",description="the slot name"),@IPSJexlParam(name="params",description="extra parameters to the process")},
               returns="list of assembly items")
public java.util.List<com.percussion.services.assembly.IPSAssemblyItem> getSlotContents(com.percussion.services.assembly.IPSAssemblyItem item,
                                                                                                                                             java.lang.String slotName,
                                                                                                                                             java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> params)
                                                                                 throws java.lang.Throwable
Get the contents of a slot as a list of assembly items.

Parameters:
item - the Assembly Item
slotName - the name of the slot
params - the combined map of parameters to pass to the slot finder. Never null may be empty
Returns:
a list of results
Throws:
java.lang.Throwable

getSlotPropertyValues

@IPSJexlMethod(description="gets all property values across the contents of a slot",
               params={@IPSJexlParam(name="slotcontent",description="contents of the slot"),@IPSJexlParam(name="propertyName",description="name of the property to fetch")})
public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSlotPropertyValues(java.util.List<com.percussion.services.assembly.IPSAssemblyItem> slotcontents,
                                                                                                      java.lang.String propertyName)
                                                       throws javax.jcr.RepositoryException
Gets all values for a named property across the contents of a slot. For each item in the slot, the property is fetched, and if it exists on that item, its String value is appended to the result.

Parameters:
slotcontents - the contents of the desired slot.
propertyName - the name of the desired property. Must not be null or blank
Returns:
a list of String values. Never null but may be empty
Throws:
javax.jcr.RepositoryException
